recipe.title: Tonnato Sauce with Arugula
ingredients: 1 (6-to 8-ounces) can light tuna packed in olive oil (preferably Italian)
Accompaniment: 1 pound thin linguine, cooked and drained, reserving 1 cup cooking water
instructions: Purée tuna with oil from can, mayonnaise, olive oil, 3 tablespoon capers, anchovies, lemon juice, and water in a blender until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
Coarsely chop remaining tablespoon capers. Toss hot linguine with sauce, arugula, and capers. Thin with some of cooking water.
